languages.text: {n}В глазах Маражая — неподдельный ужас, однако его лицо остается холодным и бесстрастным. В какой-то момент он ловит ваш взгляд, и вы отчетливо читаете жажду крови. Вашей крови.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}В глазах Маражая неподдельный ужас, однако его лицо остается холодным и бесстрастным. В какой-то момент он ловит ваш взгляд, и вы отчетливо читаете жажду крови. Вашей крови.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}There is genuine terror in Marazhai's gaze, but his face remains impassive and calm. At one point he catches your eye, and you can clearly see he is lusting for blood. Your blood.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В глазах Маражая — неподдельный ужас, однако его лицо остается холодным и бесстрастным. В какой-то момент он ловит ваш взгляд, и вы отчетливо читаете жажду крови. Вашей крови.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}There is genuine terror in Marazhai's eyes, but his face remains impassive and calm. At one point he catches your look, and you can clearly see he is lusting for blood. Your blood.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

traits.locale_text: {n}There is genuine terror in Marazhai's gaze, but his face remains impassive and calm. At one point he catches your eye, and you can clearly see he is lusting for blood. Your blood.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的目光中带着真正的恐惧，但他的表情依然无动于衷，充满平静。过了一会，他注意到了你的目光。从他的双眼中，你清楚地看到他对鲜血的渴望。你的鲜血。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is genuine terror in Marazhai's gaze, but his face remains impassive and calm. At one point he catches your eye, and you can clearly see he is lusting for blood. Your blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的目光中带着真正的恐惧，但他的表情依然无动于衷，充满平静。过了一会，他注意到了你的目光。从他的双眼中，你清楚地看到他对鲜血的渴望。你的鲜血。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの視線からは純粋な恐怖が伺えるが、相変わらず冷めた冷静な表情をしている。ある時点で目が合い、明らかに血を欲しているのが見えた。こちらの血に飢えているのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is genuine terror in Marazhai's gaze, but his face remains impassive and calm. At one point he catches your eye, and you can clearly see he is lusting for blood. Your blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの視線からは純粋な恐怖が伺えるが、相変わらず冷めた冷静な表情をしている。ある時点で目が合い、明らかに血を欲しているのが見えた。こちらの血に飢えているのだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Ves auténtico terror en los ojos de Marazhai, pero su expresión permanece impasible y tranquila. En un momento dado, su mirada se cruza con la tuya, y ves que quiere sangre. La tuya.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is genuine terror in Marazhai's gaze, but his face remains impassive and calm. At one point he catches your eye, and you can clearly see he is lusting for blood. Your blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ves auténtico terror en los ojos de Marazhai, pero su expresión permanece impasible y tranquila. En un momento dado, su mirada se cruza con la tuya, y ves que quiere sangre. La tuya.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Vous décelez de la terreur dans les yeux de Marazhai, mais il parvient néanmoins à rester calme et impassible. Un court instant, vos regards se croisent et vous voyez clairement qu'il n'attend qu'une chose : faire couler le sang. Votre sang.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is genuine terror in Marazhai's gaze, but his face remains impassive and calm. At one point he catches your eye, and you can clearly see he is lusting for blood. Your blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous décelez de la terreur dans les yeux de Marazhai, mais il parvient néanmoins à rester calme et impassible. Un court instant, vos regards se croisent et vous voyez clairement qu'il n'attend qu'une chose : faire couler le sang. Votre sang.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}In Marazhais Blick liegt echte Furcht, aber seine Miene bleibt unbewegt und ruhig. Einmal kreuzen sich Eure Blicke, und du kannst deutlich erkennen, dass er nach Blut dürstet. Deinem Blut.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is genuine terror in Marazhai's gaze, but his face remains impassive and calm. At one point he catches your eye, and you can clearly see he is lusting for blood. Your blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In Marazhais Blick liegt echte Furcht, aber seine Miene bleibt unbewegt und ruhig. Einmal kreuzen sich Eure Blicke, und du kannst deutlich erkennen, dass er nach Blut dürstet. Deinem Blut.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın gözlerinde samimi bir korku ifadesi var, yüzü ise hissiz ve sakinliğini koruyor. Bir noktada gözleriniz kesişiyor. Kana... Senin kanına susamışlığını net bir şekilde görebiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is genuine terror in Marazhai's gaze, but his face remains impassive and calm. At one point he catches your eye, and you can clearly see he is lusting for blood. Your blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın gözlerinde samimi bir korku ifadesi var ancak yüzü hissiz ve sakin kalmayı sürdürüyor. Bir noktada gözleriniz kesişiyor ve kana susamışlığını net bir şekilde görebiliyorsun. Senin kanına.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai
